director.name: Norman F. May Norman F. May

this_title: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew Season 4
trans_title: 全美街舞达人 第四季
introduction: The fourth season of America's Best Dance Crew premiered on August 9, 2009.[1] All three regular judges, host Mario Lopez, and backstage correspondent Layla Kayleigh returned. This was the last season to feature Shane Sparks as a judge. In the live finale, which aired on September 27, 2009, We Are Heroes was declared the winner.
chinese_title: 全美街舞达人 第四季
foreign_title: Randy Jackson Presents America's Best Dance Crew Season 4
